name: Rotary Dialer App
description: A nostalgic rotary phone dialer with physics-based animations and authentic tactile feedback

features.name: Rotary Dial UI
features.description: Interactive circular dial with drag-to-rotate gesture support
components: Circular dial with numbers 1-9, 0 arranged in classic rotary layout
Finger stop indicator at fixed position
Visual finger holes for authentic appearance
Drag gesture detection with angle calculation

features.name: Physics-Based Animation
features.description: Realistic spring-back animation when dial is released
components: Tween animation from current rotation to zero
Rotation limited to clockwise direction only

features.name: Haptic Feedback
features.description: Tactile feedback when crossing notches during rotation
components: Notch detection based on rotation angle
Prevents duplicate feedback for same notch

features.name: Audio Feedback
features.description: Sound effects for dial clicks and release
components: Click sound on each notch crossing
Release sound when dial springs back

features.name: Call Action
features.description: Launch phone dialer with composed number

features.name: Backspace Action
features.description: Remove last digit from dialed number
components: String manipulation to remove last character

features.name: Retro Dark Theme
features.description: Nostalgic color scheme mimicking vintage rotary phones

futureEnhancements.name: Complete Audio Integration
futureEnhancements.description: Implement audioplayers package for click and release sounds

futureEnhancements.name: Call History
futureEnhancements.description: Store and display previously dialed numbers

futureEnhancements.name: Contact Integration
futureEnhancements.description: Access device contacts and dial from contact list

futureEnhancements.name: Custom Sound Themes
futureEnhancements.description: Allow users to select different dial sound themes

futureEnhancements.name: Advanced Vibration Patterns
futureEnhancements.description: Different haptic patterns for different numbers
